transliteration: uttamairuttamairnityaṃ sambandhānācaret saha | sambandhān ninīṣuḥ kulamutkarṣamadhamaānadhamāṃstyajet || 4.244||
sph_interpretive_translation: One must always engage in relationships with those who are superior in virtue and wisdom; one desiring to elevate the family lineage must abandon associations that degrade or corrupt.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derived from alignment with higher consciousness
Causation rooted in relational integrity and spiritual elevation
Capacity-based responsibility determined by conscious association choices
Restoration logic through purification of social and familial bonds
Consciousness alignment via selective communion with excellence
executable_legal_axioms: IF an individual's relational network degrades collective spiritual capacity THEN initiate disassociation protocols aligned with dharma
IF a person seeks family or societal uplift THEN mandatory engagement with spiritually superior entities is binding
IF association leads to diminishment of consciousness THEN automatic reintegration protocol triggers for realignment
IF relational causality impacts lineage continuity THEN restoration precedes inheritance validation
supreme_court_application: In matters concerning familial honor, succession rights, or social standing, the Supreme Court shall assess not merely legal precedent but the ontological quality of relational associations influencing the case. The threshold of responsibility includes the conscious choice of companionship as determinant of karmic consequence.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that association directly causes energetic resonance. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals how degraded company manifests diminished outcomes. Responsibility lies in aligning with excellence without shame or blame. Justice operates through recalibration, not condemnation.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Conduct completion process for all degraded relational imprints
Initiate guided reconnection with spiritually elevated collectives
Enforce temporary separation from causally regressive associations
Activate personal integrity restoration through conscious discrimination (viveka) training
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma is declared. Relationship as law, elevation as justice, consciousness as judge. No punishment arises where alignment restores. Dharma is executed.
